comment: A bit odd but doesn't actually record the time for me. Found another app that works with my S3 gear so this is being uninstalled sadly.

author: Siamak Masnavi
comment: I like it because it is free (no ads), easy to learn/use, doors not require ANY permissions, and works on all my Android phones/tablets (including my 2013 Nexus 7 running Android L).

reply.author: Sarah Minnich
reply.content: Thanks so much for the review! I am glad you like it! :)

title: Useful time tracking tool for freelancers

author: Bob Hernandez
comment: very good for a basic time tracking tool.  There are several nifty features that are not obvious but are useful if you can find them. A little polish and some more configuration options would make this 5 stars

reply.author: Sarah Minnich
reply.content: Thanks for the review! We will keep working to polish it up and make it more user friendly!

title: pretty handy
